A candle only burns for so long before it's snuffed out. Break the chains and find your peace.

ARROWKEYS - move up, left and right. press down to turn around
SPACEBAR - attack
ENTER - pause

- Collect sharpening stones to hone your blade's edge and cut down the chains.
